casebody.data:
John Ralston McLAIN, Appellant, v. Lcdr. Kenneth W. BARSTOW, Appellee. No. 332, Docket 71-1800. United States Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Argued Dec. 7, 1971. Decided Dec. 9, 1971. Karl Fleischmann, Satter, Fleisch-mann & Sherbacow, Hartford, Conn., for appellant. Barry J. Cutler, Asst. U. S. Atty. (Stewart H. Jones, U. S. Atty. for District of Connecticut, of counsel), for ap-pellee.

Before ANDERSON, OAKES and TIMBERS, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM:

We affirm the order of the district court upon the opinion of Judge Zam-pano dated June 21, 1971, 337 F.Supp. 1360.
